naslov: Kuća s 3 stana Stara Novalja, otok Pag, blizina mora (prodaja)
opis: ODLIČNA INVESTICIJA !!! Prodaje se potpuno opremljena kuća sa 3 apartmana, 6 parkirnih mjesta i gril zonom u Staroj Novalji, na svega 100 metara udaljena od mora i lijepe, prostrane,  uređene pješčane plaže. Kuća je renovirana 2024. godine. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja i 2 kata. Na svakom katu je po jedan stan - 3 potpuno opremljena apartmana uređena za iznajmljivanje. Apartman u prizemlju sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, svjetlog i prostranog dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonom te izlazom na veliku natkrivenu terasu, 3 spavaće sobe, kupaone i dodatnog WC-a. Apartman na 1. katu sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, svjetlog i prostranog dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonom te izlazom na veliki natkriveni balkon, 3 spavaće sobe, kupaone i dodatnog WC-a. Apartman na 2. katu sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, svjetlog i prostranog dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonom te izlazom na veliki balkon, 3 spavaće sobe, kupaone i dodatnog WC-a. Svi stanovi su klimatizirani. U okućnici kuće nalaze se kamin-roštilj i 6 vanjskih parkirnih mjesta. Kuća ima uhodano poslovanje i odličnu popunjenost. Priključena je na vodu, struju i gradsku kanalizaciju. Kuća je u zemljišnim knjigama etažirana po stanovima.  Čisto vlasništvo, bez tereta i uredni papiri gradnje (ima građevinsku i uporabnu dozvolu). ZA VIŠE INFORMACIJA: HELGA ZENERAL 099 4158 314 __________________ EN This fully equipped house with 3 apartments, 6 parking spaces and a grill area for sale is located in Stara Novalja, the island of Pag. There is only 100 meters from the sea and a beautiful, spacious sandy beach. The house was renovated in 2024. The house consists of a ground floor and 2 upper floors. There is one apartment on each floor - 3 fully equipped apartments arranged for rent. The apartment on the ground floor consists of an entrance hall, a bright and spacious living room with a kitchen and dining room and an exit to a large covered terrace, 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and an additional toilet. The apartment on the 1st floor consists of an entrance hall, a bright and spacious living room with a kitchen and dining room and an exit to a large covered balcony, 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and an additional toilet. The apartment on the 2nd floor consists of an entrance hall, a bright and spacious living room with a kitchen and dining room and an exit to a large balcony, 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and an additional toilet. In the garden of the house there is a fireplace-barbecue and 6 outdoor parking spaces. All apartments are air-conditioned. The house has a well-established business and excellent occupancy. It is connected to water, electricity and city sewerage. The house is divided into apartments in the land register. Clean ownership, no encumbrances and proper construction papers (it has a building and usage permits).
